# Data Visualization

Some not very helpful summary of the data, need to work on this

```{python}
#| echo: false
#| fig-show: true
import sys
print(sys.executable)
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

df = pd.read_csv("data/olive_clustered.csv")

plt.figure(figsize=(8, 6))
plt.scatter(df.iloc[:, 0], df.iloc[:, 1], c=df['cluster'], cmap='viridis')
plt.title("Olive Oil Clusters")
plt.xlabel(df.columns[0])
plt.ylabel(df.columns[1])
plt.savefig("report.png")
plt.show()
```

And that concludes the report


```{python}
df = pd.read_csv("data/olive_clustered.csv")
plt.figure(figsize=(8, 6))
scatter = plt.scatter(
    df.iloc[:, 2], df.iloc[:, 3],
    c=df['cluster'], cmap='tab10', s=50, edgecolor='k'
)

plt.title("Olive Oil Clusters")
plt.xlabel(df.columns[0])
plt.ylabel(df.columns[1])
plt.grid(True)
plt.savefig("olive_clusters.png")
plt.show()
```
